string.string.respawnflavor_0: You narrowly escaped death. Only the gods could have aided that escape.
string.string.respawnflavor_1: You survived by chance, pulled back from the brink by forces unseen.
string.string.respawnflavor_10: You were saved when all strength failed.
string.string.respawnflavor_12: Death passed you by this time.
string.string.respawnflavor_13: You escaped the end through mercy, not skill.
string.string.respawnflavor_14: You were spared when the final blow should have landed.
string.string.respawnflavor_16: You were pulled from death's grasp by forces beyond your control.
string.string.respawnflavor_17: You escaped when escape was no longer possible.
string.string.respawnflavor_18: You lived through divine favor alone.
string.string.respawnflavor_19: You survived, though the world itself seemed ready to claim you.
string.string.respawnflavor_2: You barely survived. Fate itself intervened.
string.string.respawnflavor_20: You were spared when the enemy chose not to finish the fight.
string.string.respawnflavor_21: You survived because your foe turned away.
string.string.respawnflavor_22: You lived when the final blow was withheld.
string.string.respawnflavor_23: You were left alive, whether by mercy or distraction.
string.string.respawnflavor_24: You escaped death when your enemy lost interest.
string.string.respawnflavor_25: You survived because the enemy chose not to strike again.
string.string.respawnflavor_26: You were spared at the brink of death.
string.string.respawnflavor_27: You lived because your foe allowed it.
string.string.respawnflavor_28: You were left breathing when you should not have been.
string.string.respawnflavor_29: You survived not by strength, but by your enemy's restraint.
string.string.respawnflavor_3: You escaped death by fortune alone.
string.string.respawnflavor_30: You narrowly escaped death through sheer skill and resolve.
string.string.respawnflavor_32: You barely survived, turning disaster aside at the last moment.
string.string.respawnflavor_33: You escaped death through grit and experience.
string.string.respawnflavor_34: That escape was close. Only quick action saved you.
string.string.respawnflavor_36: You lived by reacting faster than death itself.
string.string.respawnflavor_37: You slipped free of death through precision and timing.
string.string.respawnflavor_38: You escaped when a lesser warrior would have fallen.
string.string.respawnflavor_39: You survived by discipline and will.
string.string.respawnflavor_4: That escape was close. Something greater than luck turned the blow aside.
string.string.respawnflavor_40: You barely endured, holding on through training and instinct.
string.string.respawnflavor_41: You escaped death through hard-earned experience.
string.string.respawnflavor_42: You lived because you did not hesitate.
string.string.respawnflavor_43: You survived by mastery, not mercy.
string.string.respawnflavor_44: You escaped the brink through focus and control.
string.string.respawnflavor_46: You survived by fighting smarter, not harder.
string.string.respawnflavor_47: You escaped death through practiced reflex and resolve.
string.string.respawnflavor_48: You lived because you knew when to act.
string.string.respawnflavor_49: You survived by turning failure into survival at the last instant.
string.string.respawnflavor_5: You were rescued at the last moment.
string.string.respawnflavor_6: You survived when you should not have.
string.string.respawnflavor_7: You slipped past death, spared by a hand you never saw.
string.string.respawnflavor_8: You lived through the fall. Only higher powers could have allowed it.
string.string.respawnflavor_9: You narrowly escaped. Fate itself bent.
